description: Embeds for virtual events on WordCamp.org

eslintConfig:comment.root: Setting this to true is necessary to avoid merging WordCamp.org configs with any that exist in parent folders in the developer's environment. See https://github.com/eslint/eslint/commit/c99e9b621fe46b8535cf59fe489977dd36cb2a39.
